name: Data
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data
description:
Data

Represents Table Data as a list of name/value pairs. Also contains metadata such as etag and total.

methods.name: kind
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data#kind
methods.description: The resource type of the API response.

methods.name: total
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data#total
methods.description: The total number of rows in the complete table.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of data.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
table = dataset.table "my_table"

data = table.data
if data.next?
  next_data = data.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
table = dataset.table "my_table"

data = table.data
if data.next?
  next_data = data.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all rows by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each row, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all rows are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each rows by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
table = dataset.table "my_table"

table.data.all do |row|
  puts row["word"]
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
table = dataset.table "my_table"

words = table.data.all.map do |row|
  row["word"]
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
table = dataset.table "my_table"

table.data.all(request_limit: 10) do |row|
  puts row["word"]
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all data. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each row of data.

methods.name: raw
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data#raw
methods.description: Represents Table Data as a list of positional values (array of arrays). No type conversion is made, e.g. numbers are formatted as strings.

methods.name: format_rows
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Data.format_rows
methods.description: rubocop:disable all Disabled rubocop because this implementation will not last.
